mapper.sql: id, user_name, pass_word, real_name, gender, mobile, role_id, role_name, dept_id, dept_name, status, created_by, created_time, modified_by, modified_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO staff_user (user_name, pass_word, real_name, gender, mobile, role_id, role_name, dept_id, dept_name, created_by, created_time, modified_by) VALUES (#{userName}, #{passWord}, #{realName}, #{gender}, #{mobile}, #{roleId}, #{roleName}, #{deptId}, #{deptName}, #{createdBy}, now(), #{modifiedBy})
mapper.update: UPDATE staff_user SET role_id = #{roleId}, role_name = #{roleName}, modified_by = #{modifiedBy} WHERE id = #{id}
